title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 78 - Evaluation Of Subsidiaries Of Insurance Companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 78 - Evaluation Of Subsidiaries Of Insurance Companies

State Regulations
§ 78.1 - Definitions
§ 78.2 - Valuation of a subsidiary which is an insurer
§ 78.3 - Valuation of a subsidiary which is not an insurer
§ 78.4 - Additional provisions
§ 78.5 - Adjustment; hearings
§ 78.6 - Foreign and alien insurers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 78

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§
107[a][40], 201, 301, 1301, 1302, 1413[a], 1414[c], 1602, 1605, 1702

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
